Text: I would think - most likely - it's an SVCD, in an "iso-like" format ready to burn. Use a software DVD player like PowerDVD to play it, as it will understand the embedded subcodes etc that some generic software video players have problems with.
Thanks for the JAV but in the future please mention in the title if they are censored or not.

Windows Medial Player will play the files - and TMPGEnc can convert them to .mpg.

Video is censored - pixellation-censored.
These files are cencored, that is a blur over the genitals. Just thought you'd know...
